content: I just have to share a comment by one of my coworkers that goes along with that. This person is extremely conservative yet adopted a black child and now has to deal with racism from his conservative friends (small wonder). He is moving soon and wanted to find the racial makeup of the area. Finding there were almost no minorities his comment “well not that the agitator in chief is out of office things will improve, Trump will make race relations better” He was joking he seriously believes that nonsense. They really do live in some kind of Wizard of Oz type world
